title: [Large-scale] Curiosity-driven Learning Design for Strengthening Digital Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in using digital devices (equivalent to smartphone proficiency)
context.additional_context: Learners (Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers) Who Need to Cultivate Digital Educational Tool Utilization Skills. Conducting Project-Based Assessments in Smartphone-Centric Limited Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for evaluating the credibility of digital information.
Learners can design learner-engaged digital education scenarios using curiosity-inducing strategies.
Learners can create digital literacy educational content using open-source tools accessible via smart devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
